text: The 1965–1966 Algerian Championnat National was the fourth season of the Algerian Championnat National since its establishment in 1962. A total of 16 teams contested the league, with CR Belcourt as the defending champions. ==Team summaries== === Promotion and relegation === Teams promoted from Algerian Division 2 1965-1966 * No Promotion Teams relegated to Algerian Division 2 1966-1967 * MSP Batna * JSM Skikda * USM Sétif * ES Mostaganem ==League table== ==Season statistics== ===Top scorers=== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 95%;" |- bgcolor="#CCCCCC" align="center" !scope="col"| !scope="col"|Goalscorer !scope="col"|Team !scope="col"|Goals |- |align="center"|1 | Abdelkader Reguig |ASM Oran |align="center"|20 |- |align="center"|2 | Mohamed Bouhizeb |SCM Oran |align="center"|19 |- |align="center"|3 | Hacène Lalmas |CR Belcourt |align="center"|18 |- |align="center"|4 | Noureddine Hachouf |ES Guelma |align="center"|17 |- |} ===Hat-tricks=== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 95%;" |- !
